text: I like to be busy and I like to have places to go in the morning, when I get up.
author: Sean Hayes

text: I remember we woke up one morning at Denny's house and John Phillips called. He said, you guys okay? We said, yeah, what's wrong, what's going on? He said, well, everybody's dead over at Sharon's house at Terry Melcher's place.
author: Barry McGuire

text: He who stands with his face to the East in the morning will have the sun before him. If he does not change his posture, the Earth in the meantime having changed its, he will have the sun no longer before him, but behind.
author: Daniel De Leon

text: The problem with growing up in a cafe was the cafe never closed, my parents worked every day of the year from morning to night. So it was a big menagerie of kids, business and cooking!
author: Anthony Minghella

text: This morning in the Washington Post there was a statistic about how 85% of Americans are Christians.
author: Sally Quinn
